00023 #include "mas5-stat/workflow/MAS5ParameterExtraction.h"
00024 //
00025 #include <cppunit/extensions/HelperMacros.h>
00026 //
00027 
00028 class MAS5ParameterExtractionTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture  
00029 {
00030         CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( MAS5ParameterExtractionTest );
00031 
00032         CPPUNIT_TEST( testExtractParameters );
00033 
00034         CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00035 
00036 public:
00037         void setUp();
00038         void tearDown();
00039     void testExtractParameters();
00040 };
00041 
00042 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( MAS5ParameterExtractionTest );
00043 
00044 void MAS5ParameterExtractionTest::setUp()
00045 {
00046 }
00047 
00048 void MAS5ParameterExtractionTest::tearDown()
00049 {
00050 }
00051 
00052 void MAS5ParameterExtractionTest::testExtractParameters()
00053 {
00054     CExpStatAlgSettings p;
00055 
00056     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(MAS5ParameterExtraction::ExtractParameters("nopath", p) == false);
00057     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(MAS5ParameterExtraction::ExtractParameters("../data/Hu6800.default.mas5_parameters", p) == true);
00058 
00059     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Alpha1, 0.04, 0.00001f);
00060     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Alpha2, 0.06, 0.00001f);
00061     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.BaseScaleFactor, 1, 0.00001f);
00062     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.BHCoef, 7, 0.00001f);
00063     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.BiasCorrect, 0, 0.00001f);
00064     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.BLCoef, 0.8, 0.00001f);
00065     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.CMultiplier, .2, 0.00001f);
00066     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.ContrastTau, .03, 0.00001f);
00067     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Delta, 0.0000009536743, 0.00001f);
00068     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Epsilon, 0.5, 0.00001f);
00069     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.EpsilonAvgLogInten, 0.0001, 0.00001f);
00070     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.EpsilonAvgLogRatio, 0.0001, 0.00001f);
00071     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.EpsilonGammas, 0.0001, 0.00001f);
00072     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.EpsilonSB, 0.0001, 0.00001f);
00073     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Gamma1H, 0.0025, 0.00001f);
00074     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Gamma1L, 0.0025, 0.00001f);
00075     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Gamma2H, 0.003, 0.00001f);
00076     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Gamma2L, 0.003, 0.00001f);
00077     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.IntensityHighPercent, 2, 0.00001f);
00078     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.IntensityLowPercent, 2, 0.00001f);
00079     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.NoiseFrac, 0.5, 0.00001f);
00080     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.NormFactor, 1, 0.00001f);
00081     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.NormMaskFile == "normmaskfile");
00082     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR);
00083     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.NumberBGCells, 2, 0.00001f);
00084     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.NumberHorZones, 4, 0.00001f);
00085     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.NumberVertZones, 4, 0.00001f);
00086     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Perturbation, 1.1, 0.00001f);
00087     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.ProbeMaskFile == "probemaskfile");
00088     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.RelConfInterval, 0.975, 0.00001f);
00089     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.SaturatedIntensity, 65000, 0.00001f);
00090     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.HPSaturatedIntensity, 48000, 0.00001f);
00091     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.ScaleFactor, 1, 0.00001f);
00092     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.ScaleMaskFile == "scalemaskfile");
00093     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.ScaleTau, 10, 0.00001f);
00094     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.SFMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::SCALE_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS);
00095     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.SmoothFactorBG, 100, 0.00001f);
00096     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.STP, 3, 0.00001f);
00097     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.Tau, 0.015, 0.00001f);
00098     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.TGT, 500, 0.00001f);
00099     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.TuningConstantCAvgLogInten, 5, 0.00001f);
00100     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.TuningConstantCAvgLogRatio, 5, 0.00001f);
00101     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.TuningConstantCGammas, 5, 0.00001f);
00102     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(p.TuningConstantCSB, 5, 0.00001f);
00103 }
